title: Low-Carb Cauliflower and Pulled Pork Shepherd's Pie

Ingredients.1: 1 head cauliflower, cut into bite-sized pieces

Ingredients.6: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup

Ingredients.8: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).

Directions.2: Place cauliflower in a pot and cover with water; bring to a boil. Reduce heat and let simmer until tender, 5 to 7 minutes.

Directions.3: While cauliflower is cooking, spray an 8x10-inch baking dish with cooking spray.

Directions.4: Layer the bottom of the prepared dish with pulled pork. Layer peas and carrots on top of pork. Spoon cream of mushroom over the top.

Directions.5: Using a potato masher, mash cauliflower as you would potatoes. Add milk slowly as you mash to a creamy, but chunky, texture. Add mashed cauliflower to the top of your casserole. Season with salt and pepper; sprinkle Cheddar cheese over the top. Cover the dish with foil.

Directions.6: Bake in the preheated oven until bubbly and heated through, about 25 minutes.
